name: Orcs Against Humans
description:
Português

Proteja o reino dos invasores!

Orcs Against Humans é um jogo Tower Defense 3D, com a arte em Voxel, aonde você precisa gerenciar seu dinheiro para contratar heróis que irão defender seu castelo de orcs invasores.

Controles

Selecionar, Construir, Melhorar e Vender Heróis: Mouse Esquerdo

Créditos Adicionais

https://alexandrers.itch.io/ - Arte

Deixe seu feedback:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfhw4BLXgcqZdMGc_M9_eaNj8Yb2B-VKgiwShtR...

English

Protect your kingdom from invaders!!

Orcs Against Humans is a 3D Tower Defense game with Voxel style art, where you must manage your money to hire heroes that will defend your castle from invading orcs

Controls

Select, Build, Upgrade and Sell Heroes: Left Mouse Click

Additional Credits

https://alexandrers.itch.io/ - Art

Leave your feedback:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfidt57857MikgF40VkSc6dsr77PR3qUDm-Hn4g...
